ourHomesPage.title: The Crescent
ourHomesPage.description: The Crescent is a retirement home in the heart of Plettenberg Bay, overlooking a magnificent mountain and only minutes away from the beautiful beaches alongside the sparkling Indian Ocean. The Crescent is truly an icon in Plettenberg Bay where residents experience a warm homely home in their golden years.

ourHomesPage.title: Eastlands Estate
ourHomesPage.description: Eastlands Mature Lifestyle Estate is one of South Africa's leading luxury retirement estates that combines the very best in healthcare, wellness and leisure amenities to offer an outstanding retirement lifestyle. Eastlands is truly an icon in Gauteng where residents experience a warm homely home in their golden years.

ourHomesPage.title: Serene Park Centre
ourHomesPage.description: Serene Park, a beautiful home close to Menlyn Maine and Menlyn Park Shopping Centre in Pretoria has been in operation since 1987. The home is set within tranquil gardens and offers a variety of different types of accommodation and th healthcare facility offers a full service to residents
